```js
var product = Product(1,"T-Shirt", 10.00, 20);
product.price();//returns 10.00
product.name();//returns "T-Shirt"
```

```js
var product = Product(1,"T-Shirt", 10.00, 20);
product.name();//returns "T-Shirt"
product.name("Jeans");//sets name to "Jeans"
product.name();//returns "Jeans"
```
